casebody.data:
No. 10-1402. Jefferson County School Board of Commissioners, et al., Petitioners v. Steve B. Smith, et al. 565 U.S. 820, 132 S. Ct. 103,

181 L. Ed. 2d 31,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 6699. October 3, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 641 F.3d 197.
